long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the thrilling world of Fireboy and Watergirl 2 - Light Temple directly from your browser! This extension brings the beloved puzzle-platformer to your fingertips, where you'll guide the elemental duo through the mysterious Light Temple. Your mission? Solve intricate light-based puzzles, work together, and navigate through challenging levels with precision and teamwork! ğŸ”¥ğŸŒŠ

Why install?
âœ”ï¸ Quick Access: Play instantly, no need to search!
âœ”ï¸ Teamwork Challenges: Control both Fireboy and Watergirl solo, or play with a friend!
âœ”ï¸ Mind-bending Puzzles: Use light reflection, mirrors, and levers to solve tricky levels.
âœ”ï¸ Seamless Experience: Runs smoothly in your browser, no downloads required!
